Title: Requires the disclosure of charges for the installation, removal or use of an air conditioning unit and the pro-rating of charges for the use of an air conditioner in certain housing developments
Summary: Relates to prohibiting surcharges for the installation, removal or use of an air conditioning unit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to requiring the disclosure of charges for the installation, removal or use of an air conditioning unit and the prorating of charges for the use of an air conditioner
